screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: from enigma import eSize, ePoint if self.timerRunning: titleheight = 30 else: titleheight = 0 self.setTitle("") orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 120, textsize[1] + 120) wsizex = textsize[0] + 170 wsizey = textsize[1] lenlist = len(self.list)*38 if (lenlist > 380): lenlist = 380 if (96 > wsizey): wsizey = 96 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: wsizey += lenlist + 15 if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 listwidth = self.getListWidth() + 10 if (listwidth > 1280): listwidth = 1280 if (listwidth > wsizex): wsizex = listwidth wsize = (wsizex, wsizey + titleheight) self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) self["text"].instance.move(ePoint(97, 12 + titleheight)) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(7, 7 + titleheight)) self["ErrorPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(7, 7 + titleheight)) self["QuestionPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.move(ePoint(7, 7 + titleheight)) self["InfoPixmap"].instance.resize(eSize(80,80)) if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: listsize = (wsizex-6, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(3, wsizey - lenlist + titleheight - 3)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth) // 2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey) // 2))

Format:%a, %e. %b.

screen.name: MessageBoxTemplate
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint
orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgheight = self.instance.size().height() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() lenlist = len(self.list)*38 if (lenlist > 125): lenlist = 125
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 75, textsize[1] + 75) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = lenlist+15 wsizex = textsize[0] + 90 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex, lenlist) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y() + (orgheight - wsizey)/2))
